channel.title: Emps-World - Bug-Free Server - Since 2006 - much content!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/wxQehvQ.png[/img]
[url=https://emps-world.net/][img]http://i.imgur.com/bX2knAH.png[/img][/url][url=https://emps-world.net/Emps-World.exe][img]http://i.imgur.com/vaLKK8i.png[/img][/url][url=https://emps-world.net/forums][img]http://i.imgur.com/Hffi33b.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Uo6nBZs.png[/img]
[size=12pt][font=verdana]Emps-World is a 317 server loading higher revision data. We use an improved game engine (LWJGL library) which makes the client more stable and faster.
We update the server and bring new quality content on a weekly basis. The game itself has a balanced combat triangle and challenging experience rates.
Communication is as important as updating the server. Therefore we let the community participate in future updates to make the game enjoyable for everyone.
Emps-World is a large and established private server and community with friendly staff and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.
You can play Emps-World, through our [url=https://emps-world.net/Emps-World.exe]Desktop Client.[/url], The downloadable client is great for regular players as you can access it from your desktop!
Our server features a vibrant, helpful community with plenty of players on the server, friendly people, perfect combat, following and protection against cheaters and dupers. We also have some features that set us apart from the real RuneScape game, including: an own game engine, some custom items and weapons and different areas![/font][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/w9dbj8e.png[/img]
250 players online daily 22 Skills Castle-Wars Pest Control Multiple Worlds OpenGl Client Highscores Perfect Animations Shooting Star Godwars Dungeon Combat Triangle 4 Quests Clan Chat Warriors Guild Brimhaven Agility Course Perfect Clipping Systems Duel Arena Barrows Fight Pits Jad minigame with 63 waves Many Bosses Full Music And Sound System Active Community Custom Items like Gods Wings and Dragon Hasta Active Staff Members benfits Members Zone(Al-Kharid) Daily Updates The most stable client The most bug free server 90% Grand Exchange Custom Bosses Helpful Wiki Daily Updated Price List Weekly Double Exp and Events Active Social Media Animated Custom Background & much more![/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UygLAQj.png[/img]
[youtube]https://youtu.be/x7-7JjHhTjg[/youtube]
[img]https://emps-world.net/img/screenshots_front/drop_party.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @emps-world emps-world
item.description:
@emps-world wrote:

[quote=“FoHammer, post:40, topic:551838”][quote author=emps-world link=topic=670756.msg4485204#msg4485204 date=1433591605]
Yes it’s still the same ownership

The domain was emps-scape.net.

Emps-Scape was reopened under the name Emps-World at 18/9/2014.

[/quote]

It’s not the same exact ownership, just one of the owners. Imported files, recreated source on a better base dumbass. I already know everything you’ve done.[/quote]

Gonna go off topic for a second
let me ask you this question.

How is a high admin supposed to import more than 15k accounts from a mysql database one by one because you can’t “import” them all at once.

Read full topic

item.title: Emps-World - Bug-Free Server - Since 2006 - much content!
item.dc:creator: @emps-world emps-world
item.description:
@emps-world wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:42, topic:551838”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=670756.msg4486981#msg4486981 date=1434686386]
Doesn’t runescape cap their FPS? I don’t understand why this makes a difference.
[/quote]

http://services.runescape.com/m=rswiki/en/Frames_Per_Second

The maximum FPS that can be displayed in RuneScape is 50;

I’m not trying to flame your server or anything. I just don’t understand why you’re making such a big deal about this.[/quote]

Because people have been flaming us about how this is an “unstable 317 there in no way it could render opengl, its shit” that’s why we began to care about making the gameplay smoother.

Read full topic

lol why are you showing off FPS on a RSPS? a potato can run it 120 FPS no lagg.

It’s nice i guess , but nothing will beat the original emps-scape. good luck

Yeah… it is the original lol.

[/quote]

Ok, can you explain to me how do we have the character files?[/quote]

Not hard to import.

item.title: Emps-World - Bug-Free Server - Since 2006 - much content!
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“emps-world, post:31, topic:551838”][quote author=FoHammer link=topic=670756.msg4486972#msg4486972 date=1434677691]

One of the best servers out there, it’s coded really smoothly Emps-World runs smoother then Runescape.

No it doesn’t

Do you get 300 fps on Runescape? I don’t think so.

Real RS’s 317 used to run at 2 times this capacity dumbass… They had hundreds of servers with minimum to no lag as-well as more than 300 FPS, these kids are impressed but that’s not even alot, you do deserve probs for probably rewriting the game engine, because you did smooth it out alot… But It’s NOT comparable with a millionaire company lol. They have and had hundreds working on it, were it was just you. FYI don’t get sassy with me boi. U already know I’m not the one.
[/quote]

Ok m8? so you are mad? let me tell you guys why, this guy wanted me to help him with his RSPS, he wanted me to be an unpaid developer, and I did not agreee, that’s why he is against Emps-World now.

And sorry for no updates, we’ve been working on finishing the VBO mode.

Thanks.[/quote]

No? Did I say I was? You’re also making false accuasations, you got in contact with me by my request.
We talked about my project, and yes I was wanting you to be apart of my team. I don’t have any ‘unpaid’ developers either, you never even responded so I deleted you off skype because I CBA to work with kids, you were being childish as shit, you couldn’t even send a reply saying you weren’t interested lol? And again, more false accuasations, you’re going to mad yourself look bad… Quote me where I said anything about being against your project, or you BESIDES that YOU ARE in fact childish. Theirs no updates because you’ve been slacking, don’t lie be honest. You’re welcome get back @ me if you wanna look more dumb.

Read full topic
